metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25723 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A reachable assertion issue was found in the USB EHCI emulation code ofQEMU. It could occur while processing USB requests due to missing handlingof DMA memory map failure. A malicious privileged user within the guest mayabuse this flaw to send bogus USB requests and crash the QEMU process onthe host, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
